mapper.insert: insert into logininfo (state, username, password,usertype,mobile,email) values (#{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userType,jdbcType=TINYINT},#{mobile},#{email})
mapper.update: update logininfo set state = #{state,jdbcType=TINYINT}, username = #{username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, password = #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, usertype = #{userType,jdbcType=TINYINT}, mobile = #{mobile,jdbcType=TINYINT}, email = #{email,jdbcType=TINYINT} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select id,username from logininfo where username LIKE concat(#{word},'%') AND usertype = #{userType}
